Class Wall

public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to control the level

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, java.awt.Point ballPos)
      Generates the level boundaries
      Parameters:
      drawArea - contains the play area rectangle
      brickCount - contains the level brick count
      lineCount - contains number of brick lines in a level
      brickDimensionRatio - contains the brick dimensions
      ballPos - contains the balls coordinates

  • Method Details

      public void move()
      Moves player and ball

    • findImpacts

      public void findImpacts()
      checks for impactes between ball and wall, ball and brick, and ball and boundaries. Deducts the score if ball hits boundaries

      public boolean ballEnd()
      checks if player has run out of balls
      Returns:

      Returns:
      returns true if brickCount is 0

    • hasLevel

      public boolean hasLevel()
      checks if there are more levels to play through
      Returns:
      returns false if level goes beyond 6
